story.text: LOS ANGELES Jan 3 Pepsi Bottling Group Inc. PBG.N on Wednesday said it recorded a noncash tax benefit of $55 million in the fourth quarter from the reversal of tax reserves. The benefit followed an examination of the Internal Revenue Service of the company's income tax returns for the years 1999 and 2000, Pepsi Bottling said in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
story.title: pepsi bottling says recorded $ 55 mln benefit in q4
